about_the_game: DevosSLime Lab is an action + puzzle platform jumping game. Lime is trapped in the laboratory. The slime blocks that make up the platform under the player's feet can be [absorbed] and [spurted]. Through such operations, players can make rational use of limited slime block resources, clean up monsters and climb up, and constantly explore their own unique clearance routes. The core skills of the game run through the whole process, but the slime blocks, enemies, and levels are designed in a variety of ways, including the normal level, gas chase level, BOSS level, and small warehouse. The game also has a statistical mode that can record the clearance time, the number of slime blocks used, the number of collectibles, etc. Players can explore their own limits.
